summary: Build a free, fully functional company website for Parimal Steel Engineers (fabrication services) with an owner-editable interface, using a black/dark yellow/metallic theme and showcasing services, location, and client list.
architectural_notes: Site must be editable by the owner via an in-website admin/CMS interface.
Primary brand colors/theme: black + dark yellow with metallic finish aesthetic.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Company logo mark + wordmark with industrial/steel aesthetic in black/dark yellow/metallic (pse-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero background with abstract brushed metal texture and subtle industrial elements, predominantly black with dark yellow accents (pse-hero-bg.dim_1920x800.png)
- Set of 6 minimal industrial-style service icons in matching theme (cabin/structure, machinery frame, railing, bench, roof shed, canopy) (pse-service-icons.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Create a public marketing website for the company “Parimal Steel Engineers” with core pages/sections: Home (hero + key message), Services (fabrication offerings), Materials (mild steel + stainless steel), Clients (list of client names provided), About (company + owner name), and Contact (location + contact details placeholders). All user-facing text must be in English.

Apply the requested brand styling across the entire UI: black base, dark yellow accents, and a metallic/industrial finish look and feel (typography, surfaces, dividers, buttons, and section backgrounds).

Implement owner-only editing (CMS) within the website so the owner can update website content without code changes. Include an Admin area with sign-in, edit forms, and publish/save actions for: hero headline/subheadline, company description, services list, materials text, clients list, and contact details.

Secure the editing facility so only the owner can make changes by using Internet Identity authentication on the frontend and enforcing authorization in the Motoko backend using an allowlist of admin principals (initially configured for a single owner admin).

Add a Portfolio/Projects section suitable for showcasing large-scale fabrication work, with an initial structure that supports adding project entries (title, short description, optional images) via the owner Admin UI.
Ensure the site is responsive (mobile/desktop), fast to load, and includes basic SEO metadata (site title, description) relevant to Parimal Steel Engineers and fabrication services in Mumbai.
Add generated static brand assets and wire them into the UI from the frontend public assets directory.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a free, fully functional company website for Parimal Steel Engineers

Add clients/portfolio section including Techno Glaze, Shree Krishna Group, Raheja, Hiranandani, Kalpatru
